locations: 4150 North MacArthur Blvd, Irving, Texas, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Host Brendan Higgins takes a look at the money Congress has been wasting on eradicating the Brown Tree Snake in Guam. The viewer is shown that Guam is a 22 hour flight away from the closest city in the U.S. The viewer is shown how Guam became a territory of the U.S., and how brown tree snakes, are, in fact, a real problem. Then the viewer is shown how the hundreds of millions of dollars have done absolutely nothing to even remotely curb the snakes' proliferation. The remainder of the show explains how "Wasted America" hopes to change things in Washington by entertaining people into being educated.
imdb.title: Wa$ted America
plot: The pilot of Wasted America focused on the most egregious form of wasted tax money we could find. Host Brendan Higgins utilizes the help of animation, music videos and live animals to explain how Congress gets away with it.::Brendan Higgins

Host Brendan Higgins takes a look at the money Congress has been wasting on eradicating the Brown Tree Snake in Guam. The viewer is shown that Guam is a 22 hour flight away from the closest city in the U.S. The viewer is shown how Guam became a territory of the U.S., and how brown tree snakes, are, in fact, a real problem. Then the viewer is shown how the hundreds of millions of dollars have done absolutely nothing to even remotely curb the snakes' proliferation. The remainder of the show explains how "Wasted America" hopes to change things in Washington by entertaining people into being educated.::Brendan Higgins
